Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam (Bite in Spider Form), Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft (10ft in demon form), Average Damage: 5 Bludgeoning (Piercing in Spider form) plus 21 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Yochlol makes 2 melee attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Mist Form, The Yochlol transforms into a toxic mist or reverts to its true form.  While in mist form, the Yochlol has a flying speed of 30ft and is incapacitated.  Any creature that starts its turn in the same space as the Yochlol makes a Constitution saving throw or be poisoned

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form.  Its statistics are the same in each form
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Spider Climb, The Yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check
Abilities.Ability 4: Innate Spellcasting, The Yochlol can innately cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 5: Web Walker, The Yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
